events: Studied at the School of Fine Arts in Krakow
Moved to Paris to live in the heart of Montmartre artist community
Befriended artists like Amedeo Modigliani, Pablo Picasso, and Maurice Utrillo
Join French Foreign Legion during World War I
Injured in combat and honourably discharged
Worked predominantly on landscapes and nudes
Fled France due to World War II and Nazi occupation
Separated from many of his artist friends who remained in Europe
Returned to France after the war
Continued to paint and exhibited regularly
